Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22869 affecting package docker-buildx for versions less than 0.14.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22869 affecting package docker-buildx for versions less than 0.14.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-buildx is earlier than 0.14.0-4, affected by CVE-2025-22869
